description:
One of the purposes of the First Amendment is to protect the people's right to speak freely, including the right to criticize the government. The government is accountable to the people, and public officials generally can't punish individuals just because they say something the officials don’t like.

Bangor, Michigan, does not seem to have gotten that memo and is now trying to determine what speech is permissible by city standards.


A small Michigan city is threatening legal action against its residents for saying anything that causes “harm” to the city. It has also denied Freedom of Information Act requests from people trying to find out how much government officials earn in salary.https://t.co/atipcriJQK
— Mackin
title: Liberal Town Wants To Make False Statements About The Government A Legal Offense

description:
A man thought he was chatting with a 13-year-old girl, but he was wrong. Predator Poachers is back with another sting operation.

On Feb. 5, Long Island Predator Poacher Douglass King, Jr. caught a predator named Amir, who admitted to King that he intended to meet a 13-year-old girl. On March 29, he caught another predator named Joe.

This is the fifth catch for Long Island Predator Poacher Douglass King, Jr., and he claims it was “the best catch [they’ve] done so far.”
title: "These people need to fear retribution": Watch Predator Poachers' funniest sting operation yet

description:
One day, the leftist mob woke up and decided to make “they/them” pronouns a thing. And no matter how progressive one is, this concept is impossible to understand or predict. This is why even Bernie Sanders appeared flabbergasted when a civil rights attorney corrected Anderson Cooper on air for not predicting her preferred pronouns.

NEW: CNN’s Anderson Cooper gets corrected after misgendering a civil rights attorney at a town hall event with Bernie Sanders.

Wow, what a bigot.

Cooper: I want to introduce Grace Thomas. She's a local civil rights attorney. She's a Democrat.

Thomas: It's They/Them pronouns,… pic.twitter.com/X0WK4ifHvc
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Woman gets shrill at CNN for calling her by the wrong pronouns... then wonders why Democrats are losing male voters

description:
Let’s take a walk down memory lane with this old-time PSA. Predator Poacher in Long Island is back after another sting operation. President Donald Trump announced a 90-day suspension on tariffs for every country except one: China. While Leftists are claiming Trump caved to the pressure, it seems more likely that China was the target all along. So, what’s happening? Where do we go from here? Will we ever be able to answer the question: is China a threat or a paper tiger?

TRUMP SMACKS CHINA BIGLY ON TARIFFS

  • "Based on
title: Sources: How Trump's Masssive Tariff Anouncment Destroyed China & the Left

description:
The fact that there are Americans who commit crimes means nothing when it comes to enforcing federal immigration laws. Rep. Pramila Jayapal knows that, which is why she’s forced to repeat lies to justify her stance against mass deportations.

Democrat Rep. Jayapal complains about concerns over illegal alien crimes while comparing it to the lie that police officers were kiIIed on J6.

All democrats do is lie and protect criminal illegals. Disgusting. pic.twitter.com/bHeoAGlaUd

title: Pramila Jayapal declares deporting illegal immigrants is wrong because Americans can be just as bad
